trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation" /> class contains information for a trust relationship between a pair of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustRelationshipInformation" /> contém informações de uma relação de confiança entre um par de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the name of the source <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da fonte <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> dessa relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the source <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome da fonte de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objetos para essa relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the name of the target <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do destino <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> para essa relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the target <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects for this trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do destino <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objetos para essa relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> objects for this trust relationship relative to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects that created the trust.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> para essa relação de confiança relativa aos objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> que criaram a relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> value for this trust relationship relative to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objects that created the trust.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection" /> valor para essa relação de confiança relativo a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> objetos que criou a relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType" /> object of the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType" /> da relação de confiança.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType" /> value that represents the type of the trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType" /> valor que representa o tipo de relação de confiança.
